comment:
It kept deleting my other additions. I also added 0.05 oz of wormwood at 15 minutes and 0.4 oz of mugwort at 60 minutes. 
I brewed 1/10/14 and as of today 1/14/14 it reached its predicted final gravity. Shocked it happened so quickly. I had a taste test and I really enjoyed it. I will add more tasting notes when i bottle but I think it will be worth doing a full 5 gallons.
